org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.security
Interface IAeAuthorizationProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeSecurityProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AePrincipalAuthProvider, AeSecurityProvider
public interface IAeAuthorizationProvider

Interface for pluggable authorization providers

Method Summary
 boolean authorize(javax.security.auth.Subject aSubject, IAeMessageContext aContext)
          Determines if a subject is authorized to invoke the service described by the message context
 boolean authorize(javax.security.auth.Subject aSubject, java.util.Set aAllowedRoles)
          Determines if a subject is authorized to perform an action on a resource by checking if the principals are in the comma-separated list of allowed roles
 

Method Detail

authorize

public boolean authorize(javax.security.auth.Subject aSubject,
                         IAeMessageContext aContext)
                  throws AeSecurityException
Determines if a subject is authorized to invoke the service described by the message context

Parameters:
aSubject - Authenticated Subject
aContext - Message Context for request
Returns:
true if authorized
Throws:
AeSecurityException - unable to authorize request

authorize

public boolean authorize(javax.security.auth.Subject aSubject,
                         java.util.Set aAllowedRoles)
                  throws AeSecurityException
Determines if a subject is authorized to perform an action on a resource by checking if the principals are in the comma-separated list of allowed roles

Parameters:
aSubject - Authenticated Subject
aAllowedRoles - Set of allowed role strings
Returns:
true if authorized
Throws:
AeSecurityException - unable to authorize request
